price: „Ко уради ово са нашим боговима?“ Повикаше они, „заиста је насилник.“
arabic: قَالُواْ مَن فَعَلَ هَٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَآ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū man faʿala hādhā biālihatinā innahu lamina al-ẓālimīna
